official_title: A University-Community Partnership to Reduce Exposure to Disinfection Byproducts In Appalachia
inclusion_criteria:
* Located in Martin or Letcher County water districts
* At least 18 years old
* Able to read/speak in English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Located outside of Martin or Letcher County water districts
